clip.quote: I am not the number one broker... but what I wanted to do is talk to you about your home and what I can do for you.
clip.why_clipworthy: This moment highlights the power of authenticity and client focus in winning business.
clip.suggested_hook: Why being honest with your clients can win you more business.

clip.quote: I don't think this is a good idea, and here's why.
clip.why_clipworthy: Shows the importance of having a strong opinion and the courage to express it.
clip.suggested_hook: Why challenging a developer's plan might just land you the job.
